name: AI Yalms
raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ Looking for a snazzy new yalm? Our friend Uncle Bazzit is selling a few new yalm upgrades, for a price of course. Head to Meetmedere, to Uncle Bazzit's shop. The upgrades are found in the shop terminal, in the back left of the room. #L "Yalmaha 29600 - Obsidian Upgrade Kit" "254817" #L "Yalmaha 29600 - Pearl Upgrade Kit" "254818" #L "Yalmaha 29610 - Sunrise Upgrade Kit" "254819" #L "Yalmaha 29610 - Daylight Upgrade Kit" "254820" #L "Yalmaha 29610 - Sunset Upgrade Kit" "254821" #L "Yalmaha 29610 - Dusk Upgrade Kit" "254823" #L "Yalmaha XL - 29478" "96088" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Note:End QL of the yalm is determined by Comp Lit. To make a ql300 (results in lowest vehicle air), you will need 1500 CL. You will need at least 750 Computer Literature to make lowest ql available. Ql of Yalmaha XL - 29478 you use, doesn not matter Yalmaha 29600 - Obsidian Upgrade Kit + Yalmaha XL - 29478 = #L "Yalmaha - 29600 - Obsidian" "253582" Skills: | CL | Yalmaha 29600 - Pearl Upgrade Kit + Yalmaha XL - 29478 = #L "Yalmaha - 29600 - Pearl" "253584" Skills: | CL | Yalmaha 29610 - Sunrise Upgrade Kit + Yalmaha XL - 29478 = #L "Yalmaha - 29610 - Sunrise" "253574" Skills: | CL | Yalmaha 29610 - Daylight Upgrade Kit + Yalmaha XL - 29478 = #L "Yalmaha - 29610 - Daylight" "253576" Skills: | CL | Yalmaha 29610 - Sunset Upgrade Kit + Yalmaha XL - 29478 = #L "Yalmaha - 29610 - Sunset" "253578" Skills: | CL | Yalmaha 29610 - Dusk Upgrade Kit + Yalmaha XL - 29478 = #L "Yalmaha - 29600 - Dusk" "253580" Skills: | CL |
